tool_description: Analyzes threat indicators and patterns to determine likely threat actor attribution using behavioral analysis and known threat actor profiles.

indicators.description: Threat indicators to analyze for attribution

geographic_context.description: Geographic context of the threat activity

error_messages: Insufficient indicators: Need at least one valid indicator for attribution analysis
Invalid attack patterns: Attack patterns must be in recognizable TTP format
Unknown geographic context: Geographic context not recognized in threat intelligence database
Invalid confidence level: Confidence level must be low, medium, or high
Attribution database unavailable: Cannot access threat actor attribution database
usage: Provide indicators and attack patterns for attribution analysis. Include geographic context and target sectors for more accurate attribution.

likely_actors.description: List of likely threat actors responsible for the activity

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each attributed actor

attribution_reasoning.description: Explanation of attribution logic and evidence

alternative_actors.description: Alternative possible threat actors with lower confidence
